article_title: Cancelling Employer Health Insurance Can Be A Kindness

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: Subsidies created by the ACA (1) plus ongoing escalation of health insurance premiums make canceling health insurance plans financially attractive for many employers. In fact this transition can be even more attractive for employees. And for some low paid moms and dads, it's a blessing.
